item.title: Why your outdoorsy friend suddenly has a gummy bear power bank
item.description: Like many backpackers, I’m a sicko. I have weighed all my gear in order to maintain a spreadsheet for pack weight on every trip I’m on. I’ve spent more money than I care to think about in order to dro
